steps.title: Show your husband you’re still happy to be together after all this time.
steps.content: Show your husband you’re still happy to be together after all this time. If you want to tug at his heartstrings, explain how you still get butterflies around him and how he’s impacted your life. What’s it like being married? Has he changed your perspective on love? How grateful are you to be his partner? Expressing vulnerable thoughts allows you to connect on a deeper level and strengthen your connection. Happy birthday, my dear husband. Thank you for being my greatest love story. Happy birthday, my love. Cheers to another year of love and laughter together! You’re my today and all of my tomorrows. Happy birthday to the man I’m so lucky to love. Thank you for being such a loving husband and father. Wishing you the happiest of birthdays! Happy birthday to the man who makes every moment feel special. Love you to the moon and back! Happy birthday to my forever crush and the heart of our family. You’re everything we could ever dream of! Happy birthday, my knight in shining armor. It feels like I hit the jackpot when we got married, and I’m still cashing in every day. Happy birthday to the most amazing husband! I am so thankful you were put on this earth and into my life. I can’t wait to make even more memories with you this year. Happy birthday! We’ve known each other for years, but I still get butterflies every time I look at you. Happy birthday to the most incredible person I know. Happy birthday, darling. You make my world brighter, my heart fuller, and my life so much better. I love you more than words can describe. We’ve shared so many beautiful memories together…and I can’t wait to see what comes next! Happy birthday to my incredibly handsome husband. The best thing about today? It gave me you. Happy birthday to the man who makes my heart skip a beat and my life feel like magic. I love you forever. Happy birthday, my love. You are my best decision, my happiest thought, and my greatest adventure. I’d choose you in every lifetime, again and again.

steps.title: Remind your wife how grateful you are to have someone like her.
steps.content: Remind your wife how grateful you are to have someone like her. Telling your partner that you love, appreciate, and care about them never gets old, no matter how long you’ve been together. Take the time to share all the small things your wife does for you (and your family), and reassure her that you’ll love her until the end of time. Don’t be afraid to be vulnerable or a little sappy—that way, she’ll know it’s coming from your heart! To the woman who holds my heart, have the best birthday ever! Happy birthday, sweetheart. You make every day better just by being in it. Happy birthday to the one who has my heart today, tomorrow, and always. Happy birthday to my real-life wonder woman! Seriously, how do you manage to do it all?! Happy birthday to the woman who makes my world brighter. I’m so lucky to be your partner. Wishing my incredible wife a birthday filled with endless joy and unforgettable moments. (Their age) years ago, an icon was born. Happy birthday to the most stunning woman I know—my wife! Happy birthday to my soulmate and the one who makes every moment special. I love doing life with you. Happy birthday to my forever crush and the CEO of my heart. Hope your day is as incredible as you are. If there’s one person I can count on, it’s you. I love you so much and hope you have the happiest birthday! Happy birthday, my love. You’re my home, my safe place, and my biggest flex. I’m so lucky to call you mine. Your birthday reminds me of how grateful I am to have you by my side. Happy birthday, my darling wife! We’ve been through thick and thin, and I’m so grateful to call you my wife. Here’s to many more birthdays together! Every star in the sky, every sunset, and every love song reminds me of you. Thank you for being the most beautiful thing my heart has ever known. Happy birthday, darling. You have no idea how much you mean to me. Thanks for loving me unconditionally, being such an incredible mother to our kids, and for being the most kind and selfless person in our family. I hope today is extra special!

steps.content: Tell your boyfriend what you love about him to make him feel adored. Does he send you cute messages and gifts? Does he randomly check in with you during the day? steps.content: Stress how much your girlfriend means to you with a loving message. Make your girlfriend’s birthday extra special by highlighting exactly what you love and appreciate about her. steps.content: Let a new partner know you look forward to more birthdays in the future. If your relationship is fairly new, you can still show your partner that you’re serious about the relationship, without being super serious or saying “I love you.” Just express how excited you are to make new memories together and celebrate more birthdays by their side. steps.content: Send a short and sweet sentiment to share your well wishes. steps.content: Turn to a funny and flirty wish to make your partner smile. You could ask them how they manage to get sexier with age, or declare they’ve officially reached DILF/MILF status. steps.title: Tell your partner that you miss them deeply if you’re physically apart.
steps.content: Tell your partner that you miss them deeply if you’re physically apart. Even if you can’t be by your partner’s side on the big day, you can always send a loving wish to be supportive. Let them know that you can’t wait to see them in person, and that you miss them more than words can describe. If possible, try to mail your wishes in a physical card—receiving something tangible is more meaningful than getting a text, making it the perfect way to send love from afar. steps.title: Share a famous birthday quote when you’re at a loss for words.
steps.content: Share a famous birthday quote when you’re at a loss for words. If you’re struggling to find the right sentiments, get help from someone else! Choose an author, celebrity, or public figure that your other half admires, then use their words to wish them a happy birthday. Whether you opt for something funny, sweet, or inspirational, it’s sure to make your partner feel cared for . “You had me at hello.” — Jerry Maguire “My heart is and always will be yours.” —Jane Austen “I look at you and a sense of wonder takes me.” —Homer “My love is selfish. I cannot breathe without you.” —John Keats “I love you down to your every quirk and flaw.” —Mélanie Berliet “I never want to stop making memories with you.” —Pierre Jeanty “I am in you and you in me, mutual in divine love.” —William Blake “Grow old along with me; The best is yet to be.” —Robert Browning “You are all of my today and all of my tomorrows.” —Leo Christopher “I love talking to you, even if I have nothing to say.” —Mahmoud Darwish “May this marriage be full of laughter, our every day in paradise.” —Rumi “You are my heart, my life, my one and only thought.” —Arthur Conan Doyle “Never above you. Never below you. Always beside you.” —Walter Winchell “I love you and that's the beginning and end of everything.” —F. Scott Fitzgerald “For all the things my hands have held, the best by far is you.” —Andrew McMahon “Meeting you has been the best thing that’s ever happened to me.” —Nicholas Sparks “So, I love you because the entire universe conspired to help me find you.” —Pablo Coelho “I would rather share one lifetime with you than face all the ages of this world alone.” —J.R.R. Tolkien “I was made and meant to look for you and wait for you and become yours forever.” —Robert Browning “I'm with you. No matter what else you have in your head I'm with you and I love you.” —Ernest Hemingway “Each day, I love you more. Today more than yesterday and less than tomorrow.” —Rosemonde Gerard “He’s more myself than I am. Whatever our souls are made of, his and mine are the same.” —Emily Brontë “I never left you; I never will leave you. While life lasts, and beyond, I am here.” —Marion Zimmer Bradley “I belong to you; there is really no other way of expressing it, and that is not strong enough.” —Franz Kafka “I love you not only for what you are, but for what I am when I am with you.” —Elizabeth Barrett Browning “I love that you are my person and I am yours, that whatever door we come to, we will open it together.” —A.R. Asher “You know you're in love when you can't fall asleep because reality is finally better than your dreams.” —Dr. Seuss “If you live to be a hundred, I want to live to be a hundred minus one day, so I never have to live without you.” —A.A. Milne “I saw that you were perfect, and so I loved you. Then I saw that you were not perfect, and I loved you even more.” —Angelita Lim “I love your feet because they have wandered over the earth and through the wind and water until they brought you to me.” —Pablo Neruda

steps.content: Share a meaningful song lyric to be extra passionate and romantic. If your partner is a music lover (or you want to add a poetic touch to your wish), use words from their favorite band or artist. Sharing a heartfelt lyric is one of the sweetest ways to wish them a happy birthday, especially if you send it with a custom playlist that reminds you of your relationship. “I can’t lose when I’m with you.” —SZA, “Snooze” “To you, I'll give the world.” —Fleetwood Mac, “Songbird” “I’d trade hours for minutes with you.” —Wisp, “See You Soon” “And at every table, I’ll save you a seat.” —Taylor Swift, “Lover” “Your love is better than ice cream.” —Sarah McLachlan, “Ice Cream” “When I think of you, I don’t feel so alone.” —Owl City, “Vanilla Twilight” “Heaven is not fit to house a love like you and I.” —Hozier, “Francesca” “Heaven is a place on earth with you.” —Lana Del Rey, “Video Games” “How sweet it is to be loved by you…” —James Taylor, “How Sweet It Is” “The moon, the stars are nothing without you.” —Sam Smith, “Lay Me Down” “Everything means nothing if I ain’t got you.” —Alicia Keys, “If I Ain’t Got You” “Take me to your heart, for it’s there that I belong.” —Elvis Presley, “Love Me Tender” “If you fall I will catch you, I’ll be waiting…time after time.” —Cyndi Lauper, “Time After Time” “You’re my end and my beginning. Even when I lose, I’m winning.” —John Legend, “All of Me” “I’ll tell you one thing—it’s always better when we’re together.” —Jack Johnson, “Better Together” “If the world was ending, I’d wanna be next to you.” —Lady Gaga & Bruno Mars, “Die With a Smile” “To die by your side is such a heavenly way to die.” —The Smiths, “There Is a Light That Never Goes Out” “At last…my love has come along. My lonely days are over. And life is like a song.” —Etta James, “At Last” “I’m a lover, not a fighter. But if anyone tried to hurt you, I would be ruthless for you.” —Kacey Musgraves, “Ruthless” “Anything’s possible since you made my heart melt. Gave me the best hand that I’d ever been dealt.” —Justin Bieber, “All Around Me” “Hit me like a ray of sun burning through my darkest night. You’re the only one I want. Think I’m addicted to your light.” —Beyoncé, “Halo” “When you look me in the eyes and tell me that you love me, everything’s alright.” —Jonas Brothers, “When You Look Me in the Eyes” “If the sun refused to shine, I would still be loving you. When mountains crumble to the sea, there will still be you and me.” —Led Zeppelin, “Thank You” “I have died everyday, waiting for you. Darling, don’t be afraid, I have loved you for a thousand years. I’ll love you for a thousand more.” —Christina Perry, “A Thousand Years” “It was written that I would love you from the moment I opened my eyes. And the morning when I first saw you gave me life under calico skies.” —Paul McCartney, “Calico Skies” “You need a place to land, I’ll be the floor. If you need an easy out, I’ll be the door. If you need a song to sing, I’ll be the chords. The wind beneath your wings, I’ll be the source.” —Maren Morris, “because, of course”
